description:
The 2nd Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, formed some time prior to 795 UC.
During the Battle of Astarte, the 2nd Fleet consisted of 15,000 warships under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch740 [Paetta]. During the battle, Paeta was severely injured and forced to give command of the fleet to a staff officer, http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Yang subsequently led the 2nd Fleet in a successful counterattack, and was able to withdraw from Astarte with minimal casualties. For his actions while in command of the 2nd Fleet, Yang became a national hero.
The surviving remainder of the 2nd Fleet was later incorporated into Yang`s 13th Fleet under the order of http://anidb.net/ch750 [Dwight Greenhill].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Dai 2 Kantai
